title: Blood Child
description: The novel opens with young Hattie Bell deep in a nightmare, dreaming of the baby and husband she lost a few years before. She's currently pregnant, the anonymous surrogate mother for a childless couple. Her hope is that the birth of the baby will end the nightmares. After her son is born it is transferred to another hospital and Hattie goes home alone - to find that the nightmares have not stopped.Cover Artist: Tom Hallman
author: Joyce Christmas
